reviewText: Loved this DVD! So many moves I wasn't expecting and so well instructed. What a difference when someone explains what you should be feeling and doing for each move vs. just telling you the pose. This was a full body experience and she talks about how each move is a core move and she's totally right. I highly recommend this DVD and any of Hope's products to those who are looking for a new view point on movement, yoga and your core. You won't be disappointed. I can't wait to check out her online yoga and fitness studio.

Love the detailed instructions on how to do the exercises to really strengthen the core and not hurt the back. This is an excellent video and I also highly recommend Hope, she has several great you tube videos as well.
